programme.title: The First 48 - Murder in the Driveway / Double Shooting in the Beans (#25)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 In a case of a young man shot dead in Little Haiti, Miami Detective Ervens Ford and his team learn the suspected killer is a member of a notorious gang. The team must hunt him down before he flees the country.

programme.title: The First 48 - Roadside Burning / Blood Ties (#19)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 In Dallas, a motorist passing along a highway discovers a man's body with a knife wound to the chest and his genitals burnt up.

programme.title: The First 48 - Hunt for Teeth / Coyote Blue (#17)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 In Kansas City, KS, Capt. John Cosgrove and his team of homicide detectives must track down a man suspected of beating his best friend to death with a cinder block.

programme.title: The First 48 - Deadly Betrayal (#20)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 With Hurricane Jeanne threatening Miami, Sgt. Joe Schillaci and Det. Olga Rome must solve the murder of the owner of a popular strip club. The club's surveillance video reveals three men ambushing the victim.

programme.title: The First 48 - Downstream Drifter / Murder in Room 162 (#18)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 In San Antonio, TX, Det. Tim Angell and his partners find a nameless man beaten to death floating in a creek; they must race to identify the victim and find anyone who may have known him.

programme.title: The First 48 - Twisted Honor / Vultures (#21)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 In Phoenix, Det. Dave Barnes must track down desperate lovers on the lam to solve a savage shotgun murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Ringside Seat
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 2 Tulsa homicide delves into a dark world of drugs and prostitution to solve the murder of a man executed in his car in a motel parking lot.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Passenger/ Death Call
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 4 When a Tulsa man is gunned down at the wheel of his car detectives turn to a passenger who saw it all.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fast Friends /The Thin Line
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 6 In Cleveland, a young father is murdered in his car and detectives discover his friend may know who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: The First 48 - Stray Shot
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 7 When a stray shot leaves an innocent man dead in his home, Tulsa detectives discover a neighborhood under siege by young terrors.

programme.title: The First 48 - Cranked
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 8 When an innocent father is brutally stabbed, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter delves into the dark and dangerous world of methamphetamine addiction in order to stop a killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Love
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 10 In Tulsa, a young woman is brutally gunned down in broad daylight. And Detective Justin Ritter suspects the witnesses know more than they are saying.

programme.title: The First 48 - Ringside Seat
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 2 Tulsa homicide delves into a dark world of drugs and prostitution to solve the murder of a man executed in his car in a motel parking lot.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Passenger/ Death Call
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 4 When a Tulsa man is gunned down at the wheel of his car detectives turn to a passenger who saw it all.

programme.desc: Season 1, A window to the stunning Napali Coast with a beautiful HD scene featuring a soothing audio backdrop of waves, birds, and breeze.

programme.title: Camping on the Mountain - Camping on the Mountain
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The Canadian wilderness and its soaring views of unspoiled nature.

programme.title: Camping by the Lake - Camping by the Lake
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Camping out in nature with a relaxing fire next to a quiet lake.

programme.title: Playa Fronton: Dominican Republic - Playa Fronton: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Season 1, The sand lies just beneath the soft lapping of waves on a Dominican tropical beach.

programme.title: Cliffside Beach: Indonesia - Cliffside Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, The thrilling view of a cliff-top lookout of one of Indonesia's most breathtaking spots.

programme.title: Beach of Australia - Beach of Australia
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Australia's rugged beauty.

programme.title: Diamond Beach II: Indonesia - Diamond Beach II: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, These shores and accompanying diamond-shaped cliffs are often compared to the idyllic beach scenes of postcards.

programme.title: Auckland Beaches: New Zealand - Auckland Beaches: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The relaxing vibe of a day at the beach, with a tour of the breathtaking coastlines near Auckland.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Consummate Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 118 The case of an Irish woman, Rachel O’Reilly, her savage murder, and the groundbreaking investigation that put her remorseless killer behind bars.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - A Trust Betrayed
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 The tragic 1999 disappearance investigation of Hannah Hill in in Akron, Ohio spans nearly 13 years before her family gets justice. Chris Hansen discovers it was a heart-breaking case of a young woman's trust - betrayed.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 When an expectant mother is found murdered, online clues lead police to every patient's worst nightmare: a doctor who uses his skills to kill rather than cure.

programme.title: The First 48 - Old Wounds
programme.desc: Season 17, Episode 20 In Tulsa, a young woman is killed in a drive-by shooting, while her boyfriend--the apparent target of the shooting.

programme.title: The First 48 - 1000 Cuts/ Draw
programme.desc: Season 17, Episode 27 In Tulsa, an innocent mother is viciously murdered with a butcher knife. While in Atlanta, a beloved patriarch is gunned down when a game of dominoes turns deadly.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Burning Rage
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 In Birmingham, AL, a woman, her son and her young niece are stabbed more than 75 times then set on fire inside their apartment. Investigators zero in on the victims' relative.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Cold Justice
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 In 1983, several young mothers are raped and murdered on the west side of Louisville Kentucky. A conviction on two of the murders leaves a third family with no justice. Until 31 years later.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Twice Told Tale
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 It's a murder case that spans twelve years and centers on one 911 call. The victim says a name in the last moments of her life--will that be enough to convict her alleged killer.

programme.title: After the First 48 - The Boogey Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 On March 26th, 2006, homicide detectives were called to the site of a burning car. Inside were the charred remains of 22-year-old Xenia Wilson, the mother of a four-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Killer Cop
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 When a newly married woman is killed at home, police believe it’s a robbery gone wrong. But 20 years later, an LAPD officer opens the cold case file and sees the crime in a new way.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Wolf in Woman's Clothing
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 The murder of a millionaire doctor’s wife sets off a massive manhunt throughout New England.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Killer Rabbi
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 When a rabbi’s wife is savagely murdered inside the family’s suburban New Jersey home, it looks like a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - They'll Never Find Her Body
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 A dedicated mother disappears from suburban Los Angeles, leaving behind three kids and a husband she planned to divorce.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Namaslay
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 When she's caught stealing, an aspiring 20-something lifestyle blogger tries to prevent herself from being fired and gets locked up for murder instead.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Ice Queen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 28 A homicidal vegan gelato maker gets her just desserts after two bodies are found in her freezer.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Dying for Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 After a whirlwind romance, a 40-something San Francisco woman finds herself married to the man of her dreams. Only she soon finds herself hospitalized with a mysterious illness, and her fairytale becomes a bizarre murder mystery instead.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Stranger Than Fiction
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 A wannabe serial killer ropes in his first unsuspecting victim. But it turns out that killing in real life is trickier than it looks on TV.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Mark Of Gideon
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 Kirk beams down on a diplomatic mission. He finds himself on an Enterprise where all the crew has vanished, and only a mysterious woman resides.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - That Which Survives
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 Kirk, McCoy, and Sulu are stranded on a barren planet where a mysterious woman attempts to kill them one at a time, while the Enterprise must travel halfway across the galaxy to rescue them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Lights Of Zetar
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 The Enterprise must deal with incorporeal cloud-like aliens who have already destroyed the inhabitants of a library planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Requiem For Methuselah
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 19 While seeking a cure for a fever ravaging the Enterprise, Kirk and Spock encounter Flint, a hermit-like Earthman, and his beautiful young ward.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Way To Eden
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 20 The Enterprise picks up a group of space "hippies" looking for Eden.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Cloud Minders
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 21 To acquire the resources to cure a space plague, Kirk must resolve a mining dispute between the cultural elites of the cloud city of Stratos and the miners on the surface.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Savage Curtain
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 22 Kirk and Spock meet Abraham Lincoln and Surak of Vulcan and must battle with some of history's most terrible villains.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 23 Kirk, Spock, and McCoy enter a time portal and get stuck in the past on a planet about to be consumed by a nova.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Turnabout Intruder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 24 The Enterprise is in danger when Janice Lester, one of Kirk's former lovers, steals his body.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Encounter at Farpoint (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 101 The new Starship Enterprise and its crew set out “to boldly go where no one has gone before." Their first mission is to explore the mystery surrounding the creation of the Farpoint station located on planet Deneb IV.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Encounter at Farpoint (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 102 At the trial, "Q" continues to denounce humans, while Picard defends his race and convinces "Q" that the upcoming mission at Farpoint will be the perfect opportunity to prove his point.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Naked Now
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 103 The crew of the Enterprise is infected with a virus that causes them to behave as though they were intoxicated.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Code of Honor
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 104 When the leader of an alien culture takes a romantic interest in Lt. Yar, he claims her for his own, to the dismay of his own wife, who, in turn, challenges Tasha in a fight to the death.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Haven
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 105 While on a mission to a planet called Haven, Counselor Troi meets her husband to be, a marriage arranged by her father years before, as the Enterprise encounters a ship far deadlier than any combat could provide.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - 100 Yards over the Rim
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 A pioneer from a wagon train in 1847 sets off to find something for his ill son and stumbles into present-day New Mexico.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Rip Van Winkle Caper
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 After successfully stealing a gold shipment, a group of criminals and their scientist accomplice put themselves in suspended animation in a remote desert cave. When they awaken decades later, complications ensue when their truck is destroyed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Silence
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Shadow Play
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.

programme.title: D.A.R.Y.L. - D.A.R.Y.L.
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young boy is found wandering without any memory of who he is. A family takes him in and begin to look for clues to help him find his way home.

programme.title: Alienate - Alienate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A man separated from his wife fights to return home while the Earth falls to invasion.

programme.title: Amanda and the Alien - Amanda and the Alien
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young Bohemian female artist falls in love with a hot human-eating alien and teaches him how to be more human. However, the police his on his trail.

programme.title: Mind and Machine - Mind and Machine
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Set in 2024 where humanoid robots are common in society, the mob reprograms a female android to think and feel so they can use it as a contract killer.

programme.title: Arcade - Arcade
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A virtual reality game becomes sentient and begins killing the teenagers that play it. And it is up to 3 friends to destroy it.

programme.title: Infini - Infini
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 An elite Search and Rescue team transport onto an off-world minding-facility to rescue Whit Carmichael, the lone survivor of a biological outbreak.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - The Innocent
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 3 Richie finds Mikey, a mentally handicapped Immortal, wandering around a rural street and invites him to accompany him.

programme.title: FailFactory - A Series of Failure Events
programme.desc: Season 1, Try as they might, people wiping out is inevitable.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Maquis, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Sisko uncovers a Federation terrorist group whose actions could start another war with the Cardassians.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Maquis, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 Sisko and Gul Dukat join forces in an effort to avert a war between the Cardassians and a group of Federation colonists led by Sisko's old friend.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Wire
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 Bashir fights to save his Cardassian friend Garak, who is slowly being killed by a brain implant to which he is addicted.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Crossover
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 A mishap in the wormhole sends Kira and Bashir into an alternate universe where Bajor is a tyrannical power and humans are slaves.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Collaborator
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 Kira must investigate the man she loves when she learns he may be the Cardassian collaborator responsible for the massacre of forty-three Bajorans.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Tribunal
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 O'Brien is arrested by the Cardassians and put on trial for a crime he insists he did not commit.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Jem'hadar
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 During a trip to the Gamma Quadrant with Jake and Nog, Sisko and Quark are imprisoned by soldiers working for a mysterious power known as the Dominion.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Search, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 Hoping to avert an invasion, Sisko takes his officers into the Gamma Quadrant to find the leaders of the Dominion

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Search, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 While Odo struggles to learn the ways of his people, Sisko discovers that the price of peace with the Dominion may be too high.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The House Of Quark
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 In order to boost his business and gain respect, Quark lies about killing a Klingon, then winds up forced to marry the dead man's widow.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Equilibrium
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 A deadly secret from Dax's past could mean the end of Jadzia's life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Second Skin
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Kira is kidnapped by the Cardassians, who try to convince her that she is really one of their people.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Abandoned
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 Odo tries to convince a young, violent Jem'Hadar that there is more to life than fighting and killing.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Civil Defense
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 A trapped crew fights to save the station from self-destruction when an automated Cardassian security program is accidentally activated.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy - Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 'Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy' is an hour-long tribute to the iconic series that shaped future generations of true crime TV, featuring interviews with the creators and exclusive behind-the-scenes footage.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 This episode includes: Platinum Pilfer, Update: Orphan Train, Ghost Lights, Greeting Card and Caruana.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 This episode includes: Dreamy Disappearance, Update: Gypsy Fraud, Lucky Choir, Brinks & UD and ATV Murders & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 5 This episode includes: Mexico UFO, Slain Sammy, Pts. 1 & 2 & UD and Missing Rainman.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 13 This episode includes: Anthrax, Undesirable Desiree & UD, Real Monica and UD: Five Separated Siblings.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack: Episode: 8 - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 8 This episode includes: Battling for Her Brother & UD, UD: Johnny Lee Wilson, Kempton's Search & UD, Missing Bonnie & UD and Devil's Backbone.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 23 This episode includes: Gander, Peggie's Brother, Cult of de Cloud & UD and UD: Polio.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 5 This episode includes: Boston Strangler II, Fred's Fatal Drive & UD, Red Robin Killer and UD: Deadly Doses.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 13 This episode includes: Newlywed Escape & UD, Gettysburg Ghosts, Trucker Disappearance & UD and Magic, the Gathering.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 6
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 This episode includes: Son of Sam Pt. 1, Mystery Cowboy, Slain Swain & UD and Update: Badlands.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 This episode includes: General Wayne Inn, Paisley Hat & UD, Son of Sam Pt. 2 and Mrs. Millionaire & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 This episode: Bigfoot II, Wandering Fishman & UD, UD: Fatal Obsession, Threats & Harassment, Murder by Arson, UD, Angels, Lifesaving Sister & UD, Deputy Death, Hoochie Coochie & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 15
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 15 This episode includes: Massachusetts Marine, UD: Taunting Bank Robber, Packer Church Fire , Ms. Miracle and Train Wreck Amnesia & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: MST3K: Catalina Caper - MST3K: Catalina Caper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two college boys enjoy Catalina Island sunshine, scuba diving, and beach 'bunnies', while another boy's con-artist parents scheme to sell a stolen scroll.

programme.title: MST3K: Daddy-O - MST3K: Daddy-O
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The crew riff on the short Alphabet Antics before watching Daddy-O (1958), a film about a group of teenage beatniks

programme.title: MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus - MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.

programme.title: MST3K: Hobgoblins - MST3K: Hobgoblins
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the Bots suffer through the 1988 B movie "Hobgoblins," the story of tiny goblin-like creatures who attack a group of teenagers.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Young Man's Fancy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 24 A story sponsored by the Edison Electric Institute that encourages use of a number of home appliances.

programme.title: MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Men - MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Men
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Our heroes discover just how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - What to Do on a Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 108 Nick wants to take Kay out on a date, but isn't sure what they'd do. The short offers ideas like taffy pulls and scavenger sales. Nothing says romantic quite like a scavenger sale.

programme.title: MST3K: Doctor Mordrid - MST3K: Doctor Mordrid
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.

programme.title: MST3K: Demon Squad - MST3K: Demon Squad
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules And The Captive Women - Hercules And The Captive Women
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 12 The guys face off against Hercules once again as the strong man fights evil Queen Antinea to get his son back in Hercules and the Captive Women.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Mr. Miracle - Debbie Macomber's Mr. Miracle
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Heaven and earth collide when angel-in-training Harry Mills, A.K.A "Mr. Miracle" is sent down to a community college during Christmas for his first assignment: to help an insecure student realize her life purpose.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas - A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

programme.title: Northpole - Northpole
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a loss of togetherness spreads across the globe and threatens the existence of Santa's Northpole, a little boy named Kevin is called upon to save the day.

programme.title: The Wishing Tree - The Wishing Tree
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young professor supervises several "orphan" students who have nowhere to go for the holidays. He brings them together through The Wishing Tree--a Christmas tree decorated with handwritten wishes. Stars Jason Gedrick.

programme.title: Love Always, Santa - Love Always, Santa
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After losing her husband 3 years ago, Celia never thought she'd fall in love again. Now, her world revolves around taking care of her daughter Lilly. Lilly writes a letter to Santa with one wish, for her mom to find love again.

programme.title: Second Honeymoon - Second Honeymoon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Revolves around a couple on the verge of announcing plans to divorce who reluctantly depart for a second honeymoon after their family surprises them with a tropical vacation as a gift for their 20th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: The Wedding March - The Wedding March
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.

programme.title: When Sparks Fly - When Sparks Fly
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Fireworks go off when Amy Peterson comes home to help save her family's annual 4th of July celebration and discovers she loves the man she left behind years ago to pursue her dreams of becoming a journalist. Stars Meghan Markle.

programme.title: A Wish Come True - A Wish Come True
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A down-on-her-luck birthday girl suddenly receives everything she ever wished for, only to realize the happy life she wanted was right in front of her all along. Stars Megan Park, Benjamin Hollingsworth and Dean Cain.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Broca Divide
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Returning from a planet with both a civilized and primitive side, all but two of the team become infected and spread a brutal virus. Will Teal'c and Jackson find the cause, or are their colleagues doomed to become Stone Age primitives?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The First Commandment
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 The SG-1 team is sent after the SG-9 team that has failed to return. They find that the team's captain (William Russ), having been treated like a god by planetary inhabitants, is drunk with power and is tyrannizing them. Can they overcome him?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Cold Lazarus
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 A strange crystal strikes down O'Neill, replacing him with a double that returns with the team to Earth to find the cause of O'Neill's private grief...his son's death. But the double is dangerously unstable. Can O'Neill return home to save everyone?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Nox
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 When a planned ambush goes disastrously wrong, resulting in fatalities among the SG-1 team, the peace-loving Nox restore them to life. But while these gentle people can bring back the dead, can they resist the deadly technology of the Goa'uld?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Brief Candle
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 On the mysterious planet Argos, the beautiful Kynthia seduces Colonel Jack O'Neill, which means he's condemned to an Argosian lifespan of only a hundred days. As he turns gray, will his team succeed in their frantic search for a cure?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Thor's Hammer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Looking for allies against the Goa'uld, the SG-1 team lands on Cimmeria, home of the legendary Norse gods. Teal'c and O'Neill are transported to an underground labyrinth of caves of the vicious creature Unas. Can Carter & Daniel rescue them?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Torment Of Tantalus
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers that in 1945, a young professor slipped through the Stargate, never to return. Together with his still living fiancée, the SG-1 team discovers the now aged professor trapped in a decaying fortress.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Bloodlines
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 With the proviso that he bring back a Goa'uld larva for study, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns to Chulak to stop the Goa'uld from enslaving his son Rya'c. Trouble is, Rya'c needs a larva to survive - and the only one available is Teal'c's.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 After working for countless hours on the Replicator coding, Dr. McKay reluctantly admits that he needs help from his sister, Jeanie. But she goes missing, McKay travels to Earth determined to find her and uncover who is behind the kidnapping.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - This Mortal Coil
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 As Dr. McKay struggles to figure out why the stargate has been inoperable, a mysterious probe plunges into the city. A sweep of the probe offers McKay a shocking glimpse of nanite code before his diagnostic program crashes and all the data is lost.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Be All My Sins Remember'd
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Armed with the means to track Replicator ships, the Atlantis team strives to eliminate the Replicators once and for all. Now, the team rushes to evacuate those human settlements in the path of the advancing Replicator forces.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Spoils Of War
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 12 The Atlantis long-range sensors detect the signal of a subspace tracking device familiar to Dr. McKay. The team follows to signal to a damaged hive ship drifting in space. Amidst the ship’s records, they discover references to a secret Wraith base.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Quarantine
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 13 When an alarm sounds, McKay suspects that a highly infectious disease has triggered the city’s self-protection system. With vital systems affected, the Atlantis team finds themselves trapped in various sections of the city with no way out.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Harmony
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 14 Wanting to maintain diplomatic relations, Sheppard and McKay accompany Harmony, a precocious young princess, on a mandatory rite of passage. However, they are unaware that she has enemies, and character flaws, yet to be dealt with.
